name: March of the Drunken Sailors
description:
THAT’S IT! WE’VE HAD ENOUGH! NO MORE FISHING! THE SEA IS CLOSED!

Defend the sea from the menace of these sailors, who wish for nothing more than to embark on another fishing trip. Unite the denizens of the sea to stop the coming menace before they can reach their vessel.

There are no health bars or damage numbers here, only mass. Instead of defeating an enemy through traditional means, you’ll need to push and pull your foes off the dock and into the sea to stop them from setting off to fish the sea once again.



Features:
  • A new way of playing a tower defense with no health bars, only mass
  • Unique challenges across 15+ levels
  • 8 wacky different towers to stop the sailors
  • In game jukebox to play your favorite tracks over and over...
  • An original soundtrack by Matthew Martino Music
